snippet.title: 👀 Saturday Sneakpeek: 'Blades, Bows & Magic' New Art Style ⚔️
snippet.description: Showing off our new 'Blades, Bows & Magic' battlefield design and game art style. We are mixing 2D pixel unit sprites within a 3D environment using the ProPixeliser unity shader. ⚔️ Follow development in our discord: discord.gg/xNXXdpcNEE 🔗
